segments.text: I observe the kitchen layout, it's straightforward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is at the sink area, handling dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet is running, water level high in the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming on the floor below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on stool accessing the upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookie jar open and in reach.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window open to the garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool looks unstable, that worries me a little.
segments.speaker: PAR
